summary: After their friend dies, three men decide to fulfill their childhood dream by going on a camping expedition for the lost D. B. Cooper bounty, with calamitous results.
cast: Matthew Price|Andrew Hampton|Jarred Rumbold|Carl Snell|Antony Starr|Dax Shepard|Matthew Lillard|Seth Green|Nadine Bernecker|Danielle Cormack|David Stott|Bonnie Somerville|Scott Adsit|Morgan Reese Fairhead|Liddy Holloway|Mia Blake|Bruce Phillips|Kate Harcourt|Ray Baker|Gregory Cruz|Ethan Suplee|Abraham Benrubi|Rachel Blanchard|Christina Moore|Burt Reynolds|Susan Brady|Connor Carty-Squires|Bart the Bear|Robert Catto|Isaac Lucas|Iain Middleton
title: De perdidos al río
